name: getCCDA
description: This API will provide the patient CCDA in XML format for the DOS/DOS date range provided.

parameters.name: dateOfService
parameters.description: DOS from getVisitDOS API call. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Format YYYY-MM-DD. If dateOfService is given then this parameter will be ignored.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Format YYYY-MM-DD. If dateOfService is given then this parameter will be ignored.
